description:
Manage your dotfiles across multiple diverse machines, securely.


## Changelog
### Features
* 6916263f9d9ecd0134c1692f04367f2383d78c5c feat: Add --path-style=all option to managed command
* 5bc19ae10c043ddb64ad30d50be20390cb9fc9d0 feat: Inform user when to use get.chezmoi.io/lb
### Fixes
* 5d568f2e7a97fa3a6de8f683ffbd39c708095323 fix: Perform post-run actions on error
### Documentation updates
* 08373052be27b30550ee2bba146fef9da928886c docs: Add link to article
* ba12f36f20b0ce4c80a68b4e16f5e1ac9d6ede53 docs: Add github.com/andre-kotake/nvim-chezmoi to related software
* 8bfb59f4c20da6a8cb83abb478de79dddf998411 docs: Remove extra 'o' from chezmoi external reference
* a3193a86b10dfc1780d78db4e0a3469651f45182 docs: Move command line flags links closer to commands
